name: CigBan
description:
Provide a long life for your negligent son with... a sniper rifle, obviously! He is growing fast. And he loves bad things. You should knock them out of his hands with a sniper rifle from cover in front of his house. Get it done before he uses these things. Otherwise, his health will rapidly deteriorate and he will live less. This сareless guy carries only harmful things. 

Who knows how it will all end if your son lives to old age?

Point & Click Shooter. 

_______________________________________________________________________

Game by Vladimir Frolov (Volkolak), Vasiliy Fokin (Bassilij)
If you find some bugs or have any questions please contact us at:
